# The `MachineSchedulerBase` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Base class for a machine scheduler class that can run at any point. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Base class for a machine scheduler class that can run at any point.

## Public Member Functions

### print() {#a03962eb8f2d1aae10915000f72a8b030}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MachineSchedulerBase::print (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M=nullptr) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
print - Print out the internal state of the pass.

This is called by Analyze to print out the contents of an analysis. Otherwise it is not necessary to implement this method. Beware that the module pointer MAY be null. This automatically forwards to a virtual function that does not provide the Module&#42; in case the analysis doesn&#39;t need it it can just be ignored.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinescheduler-cpp/#l00224">224</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinescheduler-cpp">MachineScheduler.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
